Notes: A small robot enemy that will make Mario spin around if touched. However, it can be defeated using Spin Attacks. If it falls into water, it will be defeated as well. It can be defeated by the Orange Luma in SMG2.

Obj_arg0.Name: Enable Returning
Obj_arg0.Description: If SW_A is valid and deactivated, it will always move towards its initial position.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated after killing this enemy.

SW_A.Description: If not enabled, it will remain stationary.

DemoCast.Description: Can be used to make the object appear.
